    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player​(int x,
              int y,
              int maxSpeed,
              int health,
              int stamina,
              float acceleration,
              float maneuverability,
              com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
              java.lang.String name)
        The player constructor.

        Uses the passed arguments to create a boat to represent the player.

        Parameters:
        x - The starting x coordinate of the player
        y - The starting y coordinate of the player
        maxSpeed - The maximum speed the player can go
        health - The health of the boat (robustness)
        stamina - The stamina that the player has
        acceleration - The acceleration
        maneuverability - How many quickly the player can move in the y-axis
        world - The world to create the player in
        name - The texture of the player's boat

      • Player

        public Player​(java.lang.Object[] boat,
              com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world)

    • Method Detail

      • inputUpdate

        public void inputUpdate​(float delta)
        Updates the forces applied to the player's boat according to their input.
        Parameters:
        delta - The delta time between frames

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Description copied from class: Boat
        Resets the boat to its initial position, stamina and health. Zeros speed.
        Overrides:
        reset in class Boat

      • lateGame

        public boolean lateGame()
        Detects when player is near the end to start moving end game obstacles.
        Returns:
        true if player is near the finish line, false otherwise

      • isStarted

        public boolean isStarted()
        Checks if the player has started.
        Returns:
        true if player has started, false otherwise
